text:
The Nifty futures on the Singapore Stock Exchange, an early indicator of Nifty’s performance in India, fell 0.4 percent to 7,964.





Your Monday morning briefing. https://t.co/pXw5aHgP0e pic.twitter.com/5EyoCTtRVP— BloombergQuint (@BloombergQuint) December 26, 2016






Here are the stocks to watch in today’s sessionReliance Capital: Unit Reliance Home Finance NCDs public issue gets 3.12 times demandONGC to pay $1.2 billion for GSPC’s gas block in Krishna Godavari BasinApar Industries: To consider buy back of its shares on Jan. 6Bajaj Hindusthan: Says expects power business sale to be completed by MarchJK Tyres: To consider raising funds via securities on Dec. 28IDFC Bank: Starts nationwide Aadhaar cashless payments to merchantsKotak Mahindra Bank: Says no fake accounts in any branch and full cooperation with investigatorsEssel Propack: To raise Rs 20 crore selling commercial paperGayatri Projects: To consider stock-splitIgarashi Motors: To consider absorbing units, re-organisationTata Chemicals: Shareholders vote to remove Wadia as director
title: Stocks To Watch: ONGC, M&M;, Bajaj Hindusthan And More
